page.title: 06The Arabian stud i
page.content: The horses at the {Tollard Royal Arab- {ian stud}are very beautiful in{walking and looks and this is one of their characteristics. They are of many different colours:{grey,black and different shades of{brown.}Many{grey horses are born{bay}as are other coloured horses.They grow to heights of{16}hands but some do not grow over {14}hands.The average height is{15}. At{5-6 months}the foals,which are generally born in{February},are separated from the mares.About {10-15} foals are born each year and{10 foals are there now.There are{40 horses at the stud but it does vary. The building used to be a{dairy farm but it burnt down.It was then turned into a stud and has been modernized. The stud is very clean and well equipp -ed with heat lamps and a sand school. Continued on page {7}
